Title: 41994 - Why You Should Take A Trip to a City Before You Move There
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 reasons that it’s important to visit a city before moving and either purchasing or building a new home there. You can talk about things like deciding what neighborhood you want to live in, getting a feel for what local life is like, and making sure that you’re making the right decision before making such a big commitment. Spending a few days in the city you plan to move to is a great way for you to get an idea on what day to day life will feel like. Your target audience is interested in information on travel, life, family and home décor. You can link to the target URL by mentioning moving to California and wanting to get an idea of what the area is like before you get there. Please use this link for your target URL: http://www.taylormorrison.com/new-homes/california/southern-california/carlsbad/city-guide
